infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to scan watermarked images and detect hidden messages.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to select images for watermark embedding and to save watermarked images.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow YYS-SQR to access your camera to scan watermarked images.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow YYS-SQR to access your photos to save watermarked images.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow YYS-SQR to save watermarked images to your photo library.
